news.title: U.S. and European interests are 'intertwined,' Secretary of State Rubio says
news.summary: U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry spoke at the Munich Security Conference. He stressed the importance of cooperation between the U.S and Europe.

news.title: Trump says he will issue executive order to get voter-ID requirements before midterms
news.summary: President Donald Trump says he will implement national voter-ID requirements by November's elections. President Donald Trump proclaims that he will find a way to implement national Voter ID requirements.

news.title: What's next for Cuba? Trump turns the screws as the island runs out of jet fuel
news.summary: Cuba’s government appears to be on the brink of economic collapse amid a worsening energy crisis. The country has been suffering from an energy crisis since the start of the year.

news.title: Lunar New Year gives luxury brands a chance to win back big spenders in China
news.summary: The Chinese luxury market is expected to turnaround this year. Western brands can't afford to be complacent, analysts say. The market is worth an estimated $1.2 trillion.

news.title: Average IRS tax refund is up 10.9% so far this season, early filing data shows
news.summary: The average IRS tax refund is up 10.9% so far this season, according to early filing data. Here's what taxpayers can expect.

news.title: The stock market is reflecting fears of an AI apocalypse for white-collar jobs
news.summary: Investors are shooting first and asking questions later as the momentum trade gets swept up by concerns that AI could disrupt established industries like insurance and wealth management.

news.title: A partial shutdown has hit. TSA is warning of long waits and missed or delayed flights.
news.summary: The House and Senate left Washington earlier this week without providing full funding for the Department of Homeland Security. A partial U.S. government shutdown is underway Saturday.

news.title: Crypto investors who don’t fill out this new tax form the right way could overpay on their taxes
news.summary: Crypto investors can expect to receive a new tax form this year from exchanges such as Coinbase and Robinhood. The new form will be available on January 1, 2015.

news.title: How the riptide around AI and stocks could seep into Fed decisions and the housing market
news.summary: AI is suddenly driving big swings in stocks. It also could seep into central-bank policy decisions and the U.S. housing market.

news.title: U.S. economy suddenly seems on track for fabled soft landing: 2% inflation without a recession
news.summary: Who needs interest-rate cuts when the labor market is looking healthy and inflation is cooling? The U.S. Federal Reserve is expected to cut interest rates this week.
